title: Epicurrence
subtitle: Epicurrence
awwwards: Site of the day, Mobile excellence, Devaward
header: Epicurrence is the original activity-focused non-conference for creatives that focuses on community and unforgettable experiences.

content.header: This website picked up Site of the Day on Awwwards and FWA.
paragraphs: I was extremely fortunate to work on this amazing project together with an awesome team to ensure that creatives from all over the world come celebrate the revival with a week of kayaking, rock climbing, moto, mountain biking, hiking, fishing, late night discussions, and so much more!

content.header: Some other recognitions that we got include Honorable Mention, Mobile Excellence and Development awards.
paragraphs: This project is a great example of how illustrations, animations and typography blend together to create an amazing online experience.
